name: part_007
file: tmp_【#Reine2ndMEPtember】BABY 3D BIRTHDAY CONCERT!!! (Surprises Inside)【Pavolia Reine⧸hololiveID 2nd gen】 [Tmg_zSjOTtc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Pavolia Reine performs a powerful cover of 'FIRE BIRD' (originally by Roselia). Digital frames appear on stage featuring guest appearances by Kureiji Ollie, Takanashi Kiara, Moona Hoshinova, and Kobo Kanaeru, who join in for the final chorus.
Transition to the next performance. On-screen text identifies the upcoming song as 'Invincible Rainbow Arrow' by A-Set.

subtitles.original: ついに夢へ 燃え上がれ！
subtitles.english: Finally, to the dream... Blaze up!

subtitles.original: Burning Heart
subtitles.english: Burning Heart

subtitles.original: Burning Heart
subtitles.english: Burning Heart

subtitles.original: 不意に降りた絶望もどうか怖がらないで
subtitles.english: Even the despair that suddenly descends, please don't be afraid.

subtitles.original: あなたの胸いつだって灯す夢があるから
subtitles.english: Because there is always a dream that lights up in your heart.

subtitles.original: 駆逐されるような
subtitles.english: As if being exterminated,

subtitles.original: 残酷な現実
subtitles.english: a cruel reality.

subtitles.original: だけどそれは愛故の
subtitles.english: But that is because of love,

subtitles.original: 生命の調べ
subtitles.english: the melody of life.

subtitles.original: 燃え上がる火焔より不死鳥（フェニックス）のように
subtitles.english: Like a firebird, more than a burning flame,

subtitles.original: We are... 何度だって強くなった夢は負けない
subtitles.english: We are... The dream that has become strong many times will not lose.

subtitles.original: 貴方を連れて行きたいんだ絶世の地平へ
subtitles.english: I want to take you to the peerless horizon.

subtitles.original: 逆境に負けない希望を 記そう
subtitles.english: Let's record hope, hope that doesn't lose to adversity.

subtitles.original: その音の風で
subtitles.english: With the wind of that sound...

subtitles.original: そして新世界へ Burning Heart
subtitles.english: And to a new world! Burning Heart!

subtitles.original: Burning Heart
subtitles.english: Burning Heart

subtitles.original: Burning Heart
subtitles.english: Burning Heart

subtitles.original: 不自由なあの世の答えはまだ分からず
subtitles.english: Still not knowing the answer to that unfree world,

subtitles.original: だけど前に 前だけに きっと光は射す
subtitles.english: but surely light will shine only forward, always forward.

subtitles.original: 頂点（テッペン）を問うと
subtitles.english: Questioning the peak,

subtitles.original: 透明になるほど
subtitles.english: becoming so clear,

subtitles.original: 不完全に輝く
subtitles.english: it shines in its imperfection.

subtitles.original: この魂（ほのお）に...
subtitles.english: Into this soul...

subtitles.original: 舞い上がる暁に 煌めく太陽のように
subtitles.english: Like the glittering sun in the rising dawn,

subtitles.original: We are... 闇から逃げず 支え燃える紅蓮の炎
subtitles.english: We are... The crimson flame that doesn't run from darkness, supporting and burning.

subtitles.original: 幾千回眠ってもいいから その手を伸ばせば
subtitles.english: Even if you sleep thousands of times, if you reach out that hand,

subtitles.original: 羽に変わるんだと信じて 勇気を
subtitles.english: believe that it will turn into wings, and take courage.

subtitles.original: 信じて勇気を
subtitles.english: Believe and take courage,

subtitles.original: そして明日へ
subtitles.english: and move towards tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 最初は上を見ること
subtitles.english: At first, looking up,

subtitles.original: それ望むこと怖かった
subtitles.english: it was scary to wish for that.

subtitles.original: 籠の中から銀河は遠く
subtitles.english: From inside the cage, the galaxy was far away.

subtitles.original: その星の輝きに憧れて
subtitles.english: Longing for the brightness of that star...

subtitles.original: ただ眩しくて
subtitles.english: Just dazzling,

subtitles.original: ただ悔しくて
subtitles.english: just frustrating.

subtitles.original: だけど今は一歩 ここから
subtitles.english: But now, taking one step from here.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたこう 頂点の夢へと！
subtitles.english: Let's fly towards the dream of the peak!

subtitles.original: 燃え上がる火焔より不死鳥（フェニックス）のように
subtitles.english: Like a firebird, more than a burning flame,

subtitles.original: We are... 再び誓う 頂点（テッペン）へのミッション
subtitles.english: We are... Vowing once again the mission to the peak.

subtitles.original: 貴方を連れて行きたいんだ絶世の地平へ
subtitles.english: I want to take you to the peerless horizon.

subtitles.original: 情熱の楽園まで 生き抜こう
subtitles.english: Let's live until we reach the paradise of passion.

subtitles.original: 生き抜こう
subtitles.english: Let's live on.

subtitles.original: 音楽を地図に歌え 新世界へ
subtitles.english: With music as a map, sing to the new world!
